summary: AS I WAS BUCKLING MY CHILD INTO HER EVENFLO SYMPHONY CAR SEAT IN ORDER TO TRAVEL, I BEGAN TO ATTEMPT TIGHTENING HER STAPS VIA THE EASY ADJUSTMENT STRAP THAT RESTS AT MY CHILDS FEET. AS I DID SO, THE SCREW AND METAL PLATE THAT HOLD THIS STRAP IN PLACE CAME OFF, THUS NOT ALLOWING ME TO TIGHTEN MY CHILD'S STRAP PROPERLY. HAD I LEFT MY CHILD IN HER SEAT AND CONTINUED TO TRAVEL, MY CHILD WOULD NOT HAVE BEEN RESTRAINED AT ALL, THE STRAP COULD HAVE LOOSENED, CAUSING MY CHILD TO BE UNSAFE. I'M SO FRIGHTENED IT WILL HAPPEN AGAIN AS THIA IS THE SECOND TIME THIS HAS HAPPENED WITHIN THE FOUR AND A HALF MONTHS OWNING THIS SEAT!
